pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: `downsampled_supervision_arrays` is a confusing name for a variable here. Especially since it looks like it contains two different types of values after the function call. Is `downsample_array_by_mode` always returning an array with two values? If so the name of the function is not very specific. Perhaps two separate functions if possible? Why not at the very least return a tuple?
content.html: downsampled_supervision_arrays is a confusing name for a variable here. Especially since it looks like it contains two different types of values after the function call. Is downsample_array_by_mode always returning an array with two values? If so the name of the function is not very specific. Perhaps two separate functions if possible? Why not at the very least return a tuple?
